channel.title: Open Antenna
channel.description: Open Antenna is a free and open source project that aims to free media production from the online platforms, and give the ownership back to the creators. You can either run Open Antenna from your own server, or pay to have one run for you.
channel.generator: Open Antenna Podcast Generator v1.0.0 (using python-podgen v1.1.0 https://podgen.readthedocs.org)
channel.itunes:author: Lead and Circus (LeadandCircus.com)

item.title: Open Antenna is in the works!
item.description: Open Antenna is aiming to make starting your own media platform as easy as a few clicks. Bookmark this page to keep up with the latest in what's happening in the project!
